title: Change output_declarations in function_wrapper.py to be a NamedTuple
body_html:
In function_wrapper.py, I changed the output of create_derived to be a NamedTuple. This makes the types more readable.

Also did the following:

  • Make the python typing package a build dependency. This is so that we don't have to duplicate namedtuple/NamedTuple code.
  • Add mypy.ini and mypy-files.txt for global mypy options and a list of files to type check; this simplifies the mypy command. The new mypy-README.md describes how to run mypy.
  • Update .travis.yml to use the simplified mypy command

cc @ezyang

Test Plan

Built code with changes and compared the contents of torch/lib/build/aten/src/ATen/ATen/ with a build from master (they should be identical).

body:
In function_wrapper.py, I changed the output of `create_derived` to be a `NamedTuple`. This makes the types more readable.

Also did the following:
- Make the python `typing` package a build dependency. This is so that we don't have to duplicate namedtuple/NamedTuple code.
- Add mypy.ini and mypy-files.txt for global mypy options and a list of files to type check; this simplifies the mypy command. The new mypy-README.md describes how to run mypy.
- Update .travis.yml to use the simplified mypy command

cc @ezyang

### Test Plan
Built code with changes and compared the contents of `torch/lib/build/aten/src/ATen/ATen/` with a build from master (they should be identical).
